NK002(kha)001:0: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK002(kha)001:2: +aa r+ya pra t+ai t+ya sa mut+p+aa da hri da ya n+aa ma /
NK002(kha)001:4: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba /
NK002(kha)001:5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)001:6: chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gi //
NK002(kha)001:7: rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa //
NK002(kha)001:8: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te //
NK002(kha)001:9: dge sbyong chen po 'di skad gsungs //
NK002(kha)001:10: ye d+har+m+aa he tu pra b+ha b+aa he tun te sh+aan+ta th+aa ga to h+ya ba data /
NK002(kha)001:11: te sh+aany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e bam b+aa d+ai
NK002(kha)001:12: ma h+aa sh+ra ma nah snying po 'di lan gcig
NK002(kha)001:13: brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro
NK002(kha)001:14: // mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zhi zhing bzlog par 'gyur ro //
NK002(kha)001:15: dngos po gang la dmigs te brjod na sangs rgyas kyi sku'am /
NK002(kha)001:16: mchod rten du byas par 'gyur mchod pa gang la dmigs te /
NK002(kha)001:17: brjod na 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam phul bar 'gyur ro //
